00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT2O
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_POINT2O
00022 
00023 #include "point2.h"
00024 #include "angle.h"
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00027 
00033 template <typename Numeric>
00034 class Point2o : public Point2<Numeric> {
00035 public:
00036     double theta;
00037     
00039 
00040     Point2o() : Point2<Numeric>(), theta(0) { }
00041     Point2o(Numeric x, Numeric y, double theta) : Point2<Numeric>(x, y), theta(theta) { }
00042     explicit Point2o(const Point2<Numeric>& p, double theta=0) : Point2<Numeric>(p), theta(theta) { }
00043     Point2o(const Point2o<Numeric>& p) : Point2<Numeric>(p.x, p.y), theta(p.theta) { }
00045     
00047 
00048 
00049     Point2o<Numeric>  operator- (const Point2o<Numeric>&  p) const { 
00050         return Point2o<Numeric>(this->x - p.x, this->y - p.y, this->theta-p.theta); 
00051     }
00052     
00054     Point2o<Numeric> operator+ (const Point2o<Numeric>&  p) const { 
00055         return Point2o<Numeric>(this->x + p.x, this->y + p.y,theta+p.theta); 
00056     }
00057     
00059     Point2o<Numeric>  operator* (const Numeric& n) const { 
00060         return Point2o<Numeric>(  this->x * n,   this->y * n, this->theta*n); 
00061     }
00062     
00064     Point2o rotate(double thetar, const Point2<Numeric>& p = Point2<Numeric>(0, 0)) const 
00065     {
00066         double x = this->x, y = this->y;
00067         x -= p.x;
00068         y -= p.y;
00069         double newx = (double) x  * cos(thetar) - y * sin(thetar);
00070         double newy = (double) x  * sin(thetar) + y * cos(thetar);
00071         double newt = theta + thetar;
00072         newx += p.x;
00073         newy += p.y;
00074         return Point2o((Numeric) newx, (Numeric) newy, newt);
00075     }
00076 
00079     Point2o toLocalReferenceSystem(const Point2o<Numeric>& localReferenceSystem) const
00080     {
00081         Point2<Numeric> tempp(this->x - localReferenceSystem.x, this->y - localReferenceSystem.y);
00082         tempp = tempp.rot(-localReferenceSystem.theta);
00083         return Point2o(tempp.x, tempp.y, this->theta - localReferenceSystem.theta);
00084     }
00085 
00088     Point2o toGlobalReferenceSystem(const Point2o<Numeric>& localReferenceSystem) const
00089     {
00090         Point2<Numeric> tempp(this->x, this->y);
00091         tempp = tempp.rot(localReferenceSystem.theta);
00092         tempp.x = tempp.x + localReferenceSystem.x;
00093         tempp.y = tempp.y + localReferenceSystem.y;
00094         return Point2o(tempp.x, tempp.y, this->theta + localReferenceSystem.theta);
00095     }
00096     
00098     Point2<Numeric> point2() const { return Point2<Numeric>(this->x,this->y); }
00099 
00101     
00103 
00104     
00105     bool operator==(const Point2o<Numeric>& p) const {
00106         return this->x == p.x && this->y == p.y && theta == p.theta; }
00107     
00108     bool operator!=(const Point2o<Numeric>& p) const {
00109         return !(p == *this);
00110     }
00112     
00114 
00115     
00118     std::string toString() const
00119     {
00120         std::ostringstream oss;
00121         oss << "(" << this->x << "," << this->y << ";" << rad2deg(theta) << ")";
00122         return oss.str();
00123     }
00124     
00126     std::string outputSpaceSeparated() const {
00127         std::ostringstream oss;
00128         oss << " " << this->x << " " << this->y << " " << theta << " ";
00129         return oss.str();
00130     }
00131     
00133     
00134 };
00135 
00136 template <class Numeric>
00137 Point2o<Numeric> weightedMean(const Point2o<Numeric>& p1, const Point2o<Numeric>& p2, double alpha){
00138     double beta=1-alpha;
00139     Numeric x = (Numeric)(beta*p1.x+alpha*p2.x);
00140     Numeric y = (Numeric)(beta*p1.y+alpha*p2.y);
00141     double theta = angleWeightedMean(p1.theta,p2.theta,alpha);
00142     return Point2o<Numeric>(x,y,theta);
00143 }
00144 
00146 
00147 
00148 template <class Numeric>
00149 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream&os, const Point2o<Numeric>&p) {
00150     return os << " " << p.x << " " << p.y << " " << p.theta << " ";
00151 }
00152 
00153 template <class Numeric>
00154 std::istream& operator>>( std::istream&is, Point2o<Numeric>&p) {
00155     return is >> p.x >> p.y >> p.theta;
00156 }
